import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import AuxiliaryConverter from "../components/AuxiliaryConverter"; const mainCategories = [ "length", "temperature", "area", "volume", "mass", "time", ]; const allCategories = [ "acceleration", "angular-acceleration", "angular-velocity", "area", "capacitance", "charge", "current", "density", "electric-field", "energy", "force", "frequency", "illuminance", "length", "magnetic-flux-density", "mass", "moment-of-inertia", "power", "pressure", "resistance", "resistivity", "specific-heat", "speed", "surface-tension", "thermal-conductivity", "temperature", "time", "torque", "viscosity", "volume", "voltage", "youngs-modulus", ]; // Utility to convert slug to readable title (e.g. "angular-velocity" -> "Angular Velocity") const toTitleCase = (slug) => slug .split("-") .map((word) => word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.slice(1)) .join(" "); export default function Home() { const [activeMainCategory, setActiveMainCategory] = useState(mainCategories[0]); const navigate = useNavigate(); return ( <> {/* Header */}
{/* Simple inline logo SVG */}
